title: Almost there.
text:
The UI changes are really nice and the combining of the lock button with the last parked location pave are good. The addition of tge watch app os really nicd as well, you can unlock your bike in 2 taps. 
But the apps seems to be a little buggy. I use my bike most days and i find myself being logged out of the app 2-3 times a week. This then breaks the watch functionality.

title: No more km count
text: App is nice clean and easy to use but i am quite upset I lost the tracking ability for total km used.

title: Needs work
text: I likes version 1 of the app. I could unlock the bike easily, not with this. I have to go into the app and unlock it manually. Pairing the remote with the bike did not work. Also, for some reason, tapping on the icon in the quick start section on the iPhone does not work.

title: Awesome app for awesome bike
text: Sure, the app is nothing without the bike. But together these are lots of fun and usefulness. Track your bike when stolen, unlock it, with the app in your pocket. Fantastic!
